Get Involved

If you are a student (graduate or undergraduate) interested in doing some awesome science and ache to get your hands dirty. Shoot an email to kevin [dot] bandura [at] mail [dot] wvu [dot] edu

Our Lab is located at the Advanced Engineering Research Building (AERB) in Room 304 on the WVU Evansdale Campus
